title: Incredible new TV show reveals secret worlds hidden deep under UK streets
text:

The UK is full of secret hidden underground structures - some of which stretch for miles underground.

Some of these mysterious spaces are man-made, while others are amazing natural phenomenon.

Millions of people walk on the ground above these extraordinary secret worlds every day with no idea what lies beneath.

But now a new TV show called Underground Worlds - which airs Wednesdays at 8pm on Yesterday - is shedding light on these dark and mysterious spots.

To mark the start of the series, below we've looked at some of the UK's most staggering examples… including a secret lair built in Liverpool by a secretive businessman and the madness of London's sewer system!

Click below to be amazed - and don't forget to tune in Wednesdays at 8pm on Yesterday to delve even deeper into the stories behind each spectacular site...
description: Underground Worlds - which airs Wednesdays at 8pm on Yesterday - explores amazing spaces across the country
